You can create any number of specific interfaces though the use of 
roles
. When a 
User
 logs into the system, their view of the system is defined by their 
Role
(s).
 Using the 
Administrative Interface
, you control the 
Menu
 items available to the 
user
.
 Alternatively, you can create a 
Portal
 interface for the 
Role
 that will override the 
Administrative Interface
.
 A 
Global User Administrator
 always has access to all the SmartSimple 
Menu
 items regardless of other 
roles
 they may have within the organization.
